Mary Finn

Secretary

Mary Finn has worked in education as a teacher and administrator for the past 16 years. Mary currently works as the SFUSD Program Administrator for College and Career Readiness. She manages the Districtâ€™s AVID program which serves as a support and resource for students who are the first in their families to attend college. In addition to her work in SFUSD, Mary founded and runs Polis, a liberal arts focused, adult education program for Bay Area adults.

Tyson Daugherty

Chairman

Tyson is a consumer internet entreprenuer raising three sons in the Mission. Tyson is the founder and president of Mission Bit, a non-profit with a unique computer programming pathway model that empowers youth with education experiences and professional opportunities.
